org.hornetq.jms.client

Interface HornetQConnectionForContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, javax.jms.Connection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HornetQConnection, HornetQConnectionForContextImpl, HornetQXAConnection

    public interface HornetQConnectionForContext
extends javax.jms.Connection
    Interface created to support reference counting all contexts using it.

    Necessary to support JMSContext.close() conditions.

    See Also:
    JMSContext
